Linda sequencia de portal, portal 2 é muito divertido e envolvente!

Hilarious story, but the testing/lab setting leads to dull and repetitive areas that fail to give a sense of progress. I'm not a big fan of puzzle games, so for me it was a bit of a chore to get through. You need to play it to understand a lot of pop culture references.

Sequel to one of the of the best puzzle games of all time, Portal 2 delivers exciting new content and storyline that will entertain for hours, with amazing graphics that will run on rudimentary graphics cards.

90%

This game is fun with an interesting and unique mechanic that is both fun and rewarding to learn.
Often you will find yourself thinking outside of the box while playing each level to reach the exit.

The storyline is engaging and entertaining and makes sense in the context of the game. It does not feel like it is forced in at all.

You might be worried about replayability, but with the addition of the level creator, the community can now create and share their own levels very easily. This adds seemingly infinite amounts of replayability.

If you enjoy puzzles, especially those involving spatial awareness and unique mechanics, you will enjoy Portal 2.

Ever since my friend got me into the Portal series, I have loved the games and their perplexing puzzles. I really enjoyed the first game, but not as much as it's amazing sequel, Portal 2. I love the new puzzles and mechanics, and the fact you have more freedom in the game than the first one. I love the ending and the gamplay itself, with a lot of twists and turns. I am not the biggest fan of puzzles, but this game really impressed me! I reccomend 9/10!
Fantastic game
Even more fun than the first portal game! More hilarious dialogue and puzzles to solve as you attempt to escape the power crazed artifical inteligence super computer running the testing facility.

Portal 2 honra o seu nome, esse segundo game ficou espetacular, valve caprichou na elaboração. É um jogo que te prende de um jeito, não tem como explicar, ele vem com vários testes diferentes e sempre com o seu humor que faz você gostar demais dos personagens, tanto os mocinhos, quanto os vilões, uma história misteriosa e com surpresas inesperáveis. O gráfico bonito, jogabilidade simples e muito boa, e a trilha sonora engraçada demais combinando 100% com o jogo. Na minha opinião o único contra que eu tive em relação a ele foi que a legenda do meu jogo funcionava quando queria, as vezes aparecia, as vezes não, não sei se foi bug apenas no meu jogo ou a valve pecou nesse aspecto, mas deu para entender a história direitinho e se divertir com ela normalmente.

História 10/10
Gráfico 10/10
Trilha Sonora 10/10
Jogabilidade 10/10

少给一分的原因是机翻的开发者解说模式里台词的翻译。

玩过了一代重新来玩二代时，发现了很多有趣的细节：

[spoiler]-一代中的发射和接收能量球的装置的残骸；[/spoiler]
[spoiler]-再次出现了一代中的几个实验室，包括已经没有有毒液体的19号实验室；[/spoiler]
[spoiler]-游戏中第一次遇到GLaDOS时，她将Chell丢进了焚化炉——没错，就是一代最后一关中Chell烧毁GLaDOS核心用的焚化炉；[/spoiler]

应该还有更多类似的细节有待发现。

另外，Mel实在是太棒了！
Un must have
BUENISIMO

Portal 2 is one of my favorite games to play on Steam,   the single-player campaign is so interesting I won't spoil it for you though...  the Perpetual testing initiative is enough to keep you entertained for hours endless possibilities although the Perpetual testing initiative does get a little boring from time to time you can enhance it with mods like the items switcher (link here) http://portal2backstock.com/bee2/     and if that doesn't satisfy you with the Perpetual testing initiative you can always download hammer.   but I'm getting off topic you should play Portal 2 you can play it with your friends you can play it by yourself or you can make your own test the possibilities are endless.   my final rating 9.7/10.
portal 2 was amazing. The game was fun. It is great with mods like BEE mode and the item switcher. And if making test chambers gets stale, you can always download hammer.

10/10

Für sein Genre ein fantastisches Spiel. Die Story ist spannend, die Rätsel sind anspruchsvoll. Nur bei sehr wenigen (!)  Rätseln kommt man nicht weiter und muss die Lösungen im Internet nachschauen. Die Story ist interessant und spannend, meiner Meinung liegt sie deutlich über dem, was ich von einem Rätselspiel erwarte. Wer also allgemein auf Rätselspiele steht sollte definitiv zuschlagen. Wer unschlüssig ist, aber Rätseln nicht abgeneigt  sollte sich das Spiel im Sale holen, da gibt es dieses für ~2 Euro im Bundle mit dem ersten Teil. Insgesamt ein tolles Spiel. :)
9/10
Valve are truly the best game developers on the planet, please start making games again. The world needs more..!
在画质方面并没有大突破，好歹提升一下，还是快10年前的引擎。唯一的亮点就是双人模式，可是不知道是我没有发现还是必须每次都要看一次开场cg，就冲这个反人类的设定就已经很难给好评了。很多方面沿袭了初代，也修复了不少，不过时隔9年做这一代多多少少都有些令人失望、

剧情通关之后没打双人模式，没办法，都觉得晕，不跟我打= =。也就只通关了剧情。相比传送门1，剧情承接第一代，更加完善而且可玩性提升，功能也多了不少。依旧是v社的经典游戏手感。好评如潮！一开始会晕一点，后来就不会有什么感觉了。除非你找虐去玩循环跳楼。总之，这钱花的还是很值的。

VALVE como es costumbre nos sorprende con sus juegos, llenos de las mejores historias, que además ya dentro de ellos se nota las conexiones mutuas, todo aferrado a espectaculares ambientes, y unos muy importantes personajes, de los que alcanzas a sentir cierta empatía. Agradezo a Gabe Newell por hacer parte de lo mejor en vídeo juegos, pues claro, nos lleva esperando mucho tiempo a por las terceras partes de sus juegos, aún no pierdo la fe de un Portal 3.

Portal 2 ist einfach großartig. Ich fand schon den ersten Teil extrem spaßig und lustig, aber Teil zwei macht es sogar noch besser. Leider sind die Level manchmal ziemlich einfach, und genau wie der erste Teil ist die Story recht kurz (bei mir waren es ca. 5 oder 6 Stunden). Aber ansonsten kann ich es nur empfehlen ;D

Класс. Игра захватила с первой же минуты. Сперва казалось что мы будем так же проходить испытания, как и в первой части игры, но нет... Нам дают отличную сюжетную линию, в которой куча неожиданных поворотов!

Игра оставила хорошие впечатления, от концовки, если честно, меня пробило на слезу. Да что там, на две слезы (три). 
Играйте, не пожалеете.

One of the best puzzle games ever. Especially co-op. Rare are the games where you actually get moments of "heureka, now I understand". Some of the challenges really require you to find some new ways of thinking about space and time. Recommended if you enjoy puzzles and challenges.

[h1]I only want you gone[/h1]

Portal 2 is an epic sequal to the first game but with A LOT of improvements 
Some of which is it doesn't feel like Half-Life 2 anymore(Feels like an entirely new game), the graphics are amazing and heavily improved.
Also, the main menu is not Half-Life 2 style anymore!
The puzzles are fun and challenging, the story is well-writen(You're going to love)
Sountrack is fucking amazing, masterpiece level!
You will definately fall in love with the characters in Portal 2
There are also a Co-Op which takes place after the events of the single player mode
AND there are also Steam Workshop support, it means there will TONS OF NEW PUZZLES waiting for you explore



Enough said, Portal 2 is a fucking masterpiece 10/10
If you haven't gotten this game and the first one yet, buy the bundle during a sale(It's dirt cheap)
This game right here is a must have for every steam user.
